description: Dice Loss, derived from the Sørensen-Dice coefficient, quantifies the similarity between two samples. It is particularly effective in image segmentation tasks, especially when dealing with imbalanced datasets, as it focuses on the overlap between the predicted segmentation and the ground truth.
